title: Welcome to the Smith Family
subtitle: Connecting Generations, Preserving Legacy
description: Discover your roots, share your stories, and stay connected with family members across the world. Our digital family tree brings generations together in one beautiful platform.

title: Family Memories
subtitle: Cherished Moments Through the Years
description: Browse through our collection of family photos spanning generations. From vintage black and white portraits to modern celebrations, every image tells a story.

title: Upcoming Events
subtitle: Join Us for Family Gatherings
description: Stay updated on family reunions, celebrations, and special occasions. RSVP to events and never miss a chance to connect with loved ones.

title: Our Family History
subtitle: A Legacy Spanning Generations
description: Explore the rich history of the Smith family from our humble beginnings to the present day. Learn about the events, people, and moments that shaped our family.

title: Meet the Family
subtitle: Four Generations Strong
description: Get to know your relatives! Browse profiles, see how everyone is connected, and discover interesting facts about family members.

title: Interactive Family Tree
subtitle: See How We're All Connected
description: Explore our interactive family tree visualization. Click on any family member to see their details, relationships, and place in the family lineage.
